discourse_list.title: Did somebody say Rock the Vote?

content.content: Well well well, @flipflopflapdelegate looks like it’s time to give the vote trees another shake! Y’all know the drill by now. Today I’m writing to ask you to vote on the latest executive. https://vote.makerdao.com/executive/parameter-changes-and-oracle-updates?network=mainnet#proposal-detail This is of particular importance because the executive that is scheduled for later today involves adding the Uni-LP pairs to the Liquidations 2.0 frame work. Given that the current executive updates those oracles, it’s pretty clearly a situation where we would be wise to follow the order of deployment. So dig deep, grab that piggybank of ETH for gas funds and vote away  oh yeah, as always  image500×582 74.4 KB
content.GPT-summary: The post is an advertisement for an executive proposal on MakerDAO's voting platform. The author is urging readers to vote on the proposal, which involves adding Uni-LP pairs to the Liquidations 2.0 framework. The author emphasizes the importance of following the order of deployment and encourages readers to use their ETH for gas funds to vote. The post does not contain any feedback or criticism of the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party or author is advertising proposal

content.content: prose11:  This is of particular importance because the executive that is scheduled for later today involves adding the Uni-LP pairs to the Liquidations 2.0 frame work. Given that the current executive updates those oracles, it’s pretty clearly a situation where we would be wise to follow the order of deployment.   When I save enough and have my MKR fixed it will be to vote forever! As long as the gas doesn’t eat my ETH wallet hahahaha.
Gonna bump this up for the latest executive.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
